# sakura_iam_organization_id_policy (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM Organization ID Policy.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_organization_id_policy" "foobar" {}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `bindings` (Attributes List) The bindings of the IAM Organization ID Policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bindings))

<a id="nestedatt--bindings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `bindings`

Read-Only:

- `principals` (Attributes List) The principals of the IAM Organization ID Policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bindings--principals))
- `role` (Attributes) The role of the IAM Organization ID Policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bindings--role))

<a id="nestedatt--bindings--principals"></a>
### Nested Schema for `bindings.principals`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The ID of the principal
- `type` (String) The type of the principal


<a id="nestedatt--bindings--role"></a>
### Nested Schema for `bindings.role`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM Organization ID Policy
- `type` (String) The type of the role
